Instruction: Start by pouring warm water into the bread machine pan, then add flour on top. Sprinkle the yeast, salt, and sugar over the flour. Next, set the machine to the dough setting and press the start button.
Transfer the dough to a floured work surface when the machine indicates it is ready.
Heat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Roll or stretch the dough into a large circle, making it about 14 inches in diameter with a slightly thicker edge. Lay the dough on a 14-inch pizza baking sheet and brush with olive oil.
Place in the oven and bake for 5 minutes. Take out from the oven and add your preferred toppings before returning to bake.
